mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIT_VIOL_REC(SIT_VIOL_REC_ID, SIT_BACKUP_ID, VIOL_TYPE_ID, ) VALUES()
mapper.select: SELECT SREG.NAME, SVIO.SIT_BACKUP_ID , SVIO.SIT_VIOL_REC_ID, VTYPE.TYPE, SVIO.REC_DATE FROM SIT_VIOL_REC SVIO, SIT_BACKUP SBAC, SIT_REG SREG, VIOL_TYPES VTYPE WHERE SVIO.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SVIO.VIOL_TYPE_ID = VTYPE.VIOL_TYPE_ID ORDER BY SVIO.REC_DATE DESC

SELECT SREG.NAME, SVIO.SIT_BACKUP_ID , SVIO.SIT_VIOL_REC_ID, VTYPE.TYPE, SVIO.REC_DATE FROM SIT_VIOL_REC SVIO, SIT_BACKUP SBAC, SIT_REG SREG, VIOL_TYPES VTYPE WHERE SVIO.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SVIO.VIOL_TYPE_ID = VTYPE.VIOL_TYPE_ID AND SREG.NAME LIKE #{name} ORDER BY SVIO.REC_DATE DESC
